title: Can't Move Without Pressing CapsLock
body: Hi guys, I have a probem. Everytime I want to play League I have to press CapsLock to move, buy some stuff or use an ability. Do you know why this happens? Any advice/help?

replies.body: That's a really strange issue!  Do you have any special mouse or keyboard setups or macros that might be causing it?  If so, can you swap out the hardware to rule out possibilities with that?  Let me know if that helps.
